scripts.start-docker: npm run-script -- start-docker-build && npm run-script -- start-docker-run
scripts.start-docker-tracers-build: npm run-script -- start-docker-tracers-server-build && npm run-script -- start-docker-tracers-java-build && npm run-script -- start-docker-tracers-python-build
scripts.start-docker-tracers-run: docker container run --rm --interactive --tty --publish 8000:8000 --volume /var/run/docker.sock:/var/run/docker.sock -- tracer:server -- --port 8000 --tracer java 'docker container run --rm --interactive -- tracer:java {}' --tracer python 'docker container run --rm --interactive -- tracer:python {}'
scripts.start-docker-tracers: npm run-script -- start-docker-tracers-build && npm run-script -- start-docker-tracers-run
